Package org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

Class LoggingSystem

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggingSystem
public class LoggingSystem extends Object
Handles initializing the Log4j API through Provider discovery. This keeps track of which LoggerContextFactory to use in LogManager along with factories for ThreadContextMap and ThreadContextStack to use in ThreadContext.
Since:
3.0.0
